news_header: A recent discovery by the KM3NeT telescope in the Mediterranean revealed an ultra-high-energy neutrino, approximately 20 times more energetic than previously recorded.
news_original_title: A cosmic neutrino of unknown origins smashes energy records
news_text: This neutrino, detected in February 2023, could provide insights into cosmic phenomena like supermassive black holes. Researchers are excited about the potential of these particles to enhance our understanding of the universe, although pinpointing their origins remains challenging.
